name: backend
description: > mongoDB, express, React, nodejs * mongodb is a **NOSQL database** which stores documents in **collection** instaed of **records and tables** as in **SQL database**. * nodejs is a **javascrpit engine** originally built for browser, now can work without a browser and having some extra **APIs** and allows us to run the jasvascrit outside of the browser. * express a framework for the **nodejs** which helps to ease the process. * react is a **js library** to build fast and scalable user interface. it is a **view part** in mern stack.
